ovdesc.p: Input feed for AM Model Portfolio Rebuild

This workfile is used by the enquiry AM.DYN.MODEL.PORT.REVIEW to take the user input from the editable fields on the enquiry and process the AM.MODEL.PORT.REBUILD held records, amending as appropriate and then authorising them.
The records are held on the system for a length of time as defined in the field DYN.MODEL.LIFESPAN in the AM.PARAMETER record for the company.

desc.p: Id to the AM.MODEL.PORT.REBUILD record that is updated with respect to the AMEND.PROP.NOM and AMEND.ACTION fields.
Id of the USER that generated these orders via the AM.DYN.MODEL.PORT.REVIEW enquiry.
Terminal Number that the user that generated these orders via the AM.DYN.MODEL.PORT.REVIEW enquiry was logged on to.
Key to this record - automatically generated.
Buy or Sell - indicates whether a Buy or Sell is processed against the AM.MODEL.PORT.REBUILD record with the key in the related TARGET.ID multivalue.
Nominal Value - this is the nominal value that is processed against the AM.MODEL.PORT.REBUILD record with the key in the related TARGET.ID multivalue.
Date on which these orders were generated via the AM.DYN.MODEL.PORT.REVIEW enquiry.
Time at which these orders were generated via the AM.DYN.MODEL.PORT.REVIEW enquiry.
